title: All of the following account for nativist senti...

content.prompt: All of the following account for nativist sentiment against the “new immigrants” of the late nineteenth century EXCEPT that the immigrants

choices.label: were willing to work for lower wages than were native-born workers
were not familiar with the United States political system
dominate the professions of law, medicine, and engineering

topic.text: 6.9: Responses to Immigration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
